SEARCH
Package oop2.jeopardy.model

Class Question

java.lang.Object
oop2.jeopardy.model.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a single Jeopardy-style question containing:
  • A category name
  • A point value
  • The question text
  • A map of answer options, typically A–D
  • The correct answer key (e.g., "A")
  • A flag indicating whether the question has been used

This class is mapped from JSON files using Jackson. The JsonIgnoreProperties annotation ensures that additional or unknown fields in the JSON source are safely ignored during parsing.

Used by parsers, the QuestionBank, and the GameBoard to display questions, validate answers, and track question usage.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kadie Bisnath - 816036090

      category - the category of the question

      question - the text of the question
      options - map of answer choices (e.g., A–D)
      correctAnswer - the key representing the correct answer
